subject: Re: [junit] How to test void methods??
msgSnippet: ... Ah, but there were two questions in your original post.  The FAQ addressed the one about testing methods that do not return a value. With regards to
messageBody:
Pardeep Duggal wrote:

>hi,
>thanx for ur reply. i did go thru the link u told, but still not very clear
>as to what is the best way to test the databse related methods. is it better
>to create a test database and carry out the tests or is there some better
>way of doing this??
>
>

Ah, but there were two questions in your original post. The FAQ
addressed the one about testing methods that do not return a value.

With regards to testing databases, I've found these resources to be helpful:

http://www.dallaway.com/acad/dbunit.html
http://www.mockobjects.com/papers/jdbc_testfirst.html

Please let us know how you decide to do the testing, so that we can all
learn something new.

Mike
